modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "ExportVDs",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "vdResource",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "binding": "rest",
                  "resource": "virtualdomainexports"
            },
            {
                  "name": "SelectVDBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "vdFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Virtual Domain Filter",
                              "model": "",
                              "onUpdate": "$vdGrid.$load();",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Filter...",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {},
                              "readonly": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "vdPageFilter",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Used by page like:",
                              "model": "",
                              "onUpdate": "",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Page...",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "parameters": {},
                              "validation": {},
                              "readonly": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "vdFilterData",
                              "type": "data",
                              "model": "vdResource",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "serviceName": "$vdFilter"
                              },
                              "loadInitially": false
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "ApplyFiltered",
                              "type": "button",
                              "label": "Export all filtered virtual domains",
                              "onClick": "console.log('Apply pressed');\nvar item={serviceName:$vdFilter, exportVirtualDomain:'1', pageLike: $vdPageFilter};\n$vdFilterDataDS.data=[];\n$vdFilterDataDS.add( item);\n$vdFilterDataDS.save();"
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "ShowVD",
                  "type": "form",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "Intro",
                              "type": "literal",
                              "label": "",
                              "value": "The table below shows the Page Builder virtual domains matching the Virtual domain Filter above (use % (any character sequence) and _ (any character) as wild card). You can select the items you like to export and then press the Export Button."
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "vdGrid",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "vdResource",
                              "label": "Virtual domains to export",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "serviceName": "$vdFilter",
                                    "pageLike": "$vdPageFilter"
                              },
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": true,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": true,
                              "pageSize": 10,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "vdID",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "value": "",
                                          "model": "serviceName",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "label": "Name",
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "lastUpdated",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Last update",
                                          "model": "lastUpdated",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": true,
                                          "required": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "fileTimestamp",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Timestamp File",
                                          "model": "fileTimestamp",
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": true,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "export",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Select for Export",
                                          "value": "1",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "exportVirtualDomain",
                                          "onUpdate": "",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    }
                              ],
                              "submit": "",
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "saveDataLabel": "Export"
                        }
                  ],
                  "nextButtonLabel": "",
                  "label": "Filtered virtual domains"
            }
      ],
      "documentation": "Export Virtual Domains",
      "title": "Export Virtual Domains",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "label": "Export Virtual Domains"
}
